title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 June 2012 - XWiki
content:

01:40 <abusenius> has quit  
02:06 <npm> I got a script to bulk undelete documents, but what happens to document objects?? see: http://www.nielsmayer.com/bin/view/Sandbox/MwDelDocs  
02:06 <npm> also any comments on the code, which works, other than not restoring document objects?  
02:19 <npm> ^^^ abobe document is a printout of the sourcecode... do i need to do the same thing for restoring a deleted documents objects as i do for attachments  
02:19 <npm> i thought i'd paralleled what happens in the undelete action.  
02:20 <npm> s/adobe/above  
02:20 <npm> s/abobe/above i mean :-)  
02:26 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:28 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
02:40 <@cjd> http://maven.xwiki.org/site/xwiki-commons-pom/xwiki-platform/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/apidocs/com/xpn/xwiki/store/XWikiHibernateRecycleBinStore.html  
02:40 <@cjd> this might be helpful, it's a very old version of the javadoc but that class has not changed since  
02:46 <@cjd> IIRC  restoreFromRecycleBin(XWikiDocument doc, long index, XWikiContext context, boolean bTransaction) takes an empty document shell and a database id number and it returns a document which you then have to save

20:15 <@sdumitriu> vdox2: Ping  
21:20 <vdox2> hi  
21:21 <vdox2> sdumitriu: what's up?  
21:21 <@sdumitriu> Did you solve the connection problem?  
21:22 <vdox2> sdumitriu: no. i just finished testing my sample hibernate webapp, which worked  
21:22 <vdox2> and i changed it to access the db via jndi  
21:22 <vdox2> for some reason xwiki doesn't work. nullpointerexception is being thrown in hibernate initialisation  
21:23 <@sdumitriu> OK then, one more question, are you using the tomcat or jetty version?  
21:23 <@sdumitriu> (of geronimo)  
21:23 <vdox2> tomcat  
21:23 <@sdumitriu> OK, good  
21:23 <@sdumitriu> I'm trying to set up an instance to see if it works  
21:23 <vdox2> all right  
21:26 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
21:43 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
21:45 <vmassol> has quit  
21:46 <vdox2> sdumitriu: I think there's an error in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationGeronimo.  See geronimo-web.xml. At the bottom of that file, there's the element resource-ref. That should be in web.xml, I think  
21:47 <@sdumitriu> vdox2: True  
21:47 <@sdumitriu> Feel free to edit the wiki  
22:11 <vdox2> well, i was wrong, it does belong in both files but resource-link should be jdbc/XWikiDS, it seems  
22:11 <vdox2> i'll fix the wiki if we get this to work :) right now i'm not sure what should be what since xwiki doesn't work  
23:14 <vdox2> sdumitriu: i'm not sure if i posted it before, but here's the full error trace when i try to load xwiki in geronimo: pastebin.ca/2164127  
23:38 <abusenius> has quit
